title: Chicago
blurb: Architecture, lakefront paths, world-class museums, and a legendary food scene.

title: Queens
blurb: Flushing food courts, LIC skyline parks, Citi Field, and global neighborhoods.

title: London
blurb: Royal landmarks, world-class museums, bustling markets, and Thames river walks.

title: Tokyo
blurb: Temples, neon districts, amazing street food, and spotless high-speed transit.

title: Coastal Town
blurb: Turquoise water, palm-lined beaches, and a perfect spot for lazy afternoons.

title: Mountain Village
blurb: Scenic hikes, breathtaking overlooks, and cozy family-friendly trail loops.

title: Historic City
blurb: Old town squares, cobblestones, café culture, and preserved historic landmarks.

title: World Museum
blurb: An iconic collection of art and history housed in a globally famous museum.
